name: Fight Against Opium
description:
Helmand is the largest province in southern Afghanistan. Area: 58,584 kilometers Population:
879,500. This game has been taken from a real mission. A mission in which soldiers have to
clean Helmand (a province in Afghanistan) from drugs (opium). Clear out the drugs. Soldiers
face many obstacles like tall corn plants and the enemies who protect the drugs. Some of the
obstacles that come across the player in this game are the ones which soldiers face during real
life missions. Objective: Pointing to the existing problems in some of the provinces of
Afghanistan such as planting opium, and encouraging the farmers to plant saffron instead of
opium. That way they can improve Afghanistan's economy
